name: StarOne IT Solutions
description: We are an IT services company providing specialized IT solutions for our clients. We are based out of Trivandrum, Kerala. Nurtured by a uniquely inspiring mentor, we, a group of young IT professionals help global enterprises with their unique IT needs. We enjoy meeting project challenges with out-of-the-box thinking and strive to add value through our service quality. We help in creating innovative and pragmatic solutions that bring in measurable business improvement to our clients.
